items.name: Broken Vessel
items.how-to-find: Broken Vessel can be found near the far west corner of the Ancient Basin, guarding the Monarch Wings Ability.

items.name: Brooding Mawlek
items.how-to-find: The Brooding Mawlek in the Forgotten Crossroads is found beyond a wall jump section in a blocked room to the left of the vertical shaft filled with Gruzzers and Tiktiks.

items.name: The Collector
items.how-to-find: The Collector is locked in the Tower of Love, which can only be accessed using the Love Key, found in the Queen's Gardens. The Tower can only be entered from the deep lift shaft between Kingdom's Edge and the City of Tears.

items.name: Dung Defender
items.how-to-find: Dung Defender is located in the east part of the Royal Waterways.

items.name: False Knight
items.how-to-find: False Knight is located in the centre of the Forgotten Crossroads.

items.name: Gruz Mother
items.how-to-find: Gruz Mother can be found in the Forgotten Crossroads, sleeping peacefully until disturbed.

items.name: Hornet Protector
items.how-to-find: Hornet Protector can be fought in Greenpath.

items.name: Hornet Sentinel
items.how-to-find: Hornet Sentinel can be fought in the Kingdom's Edge.

items.name: Mantis Lords
items.how-to-find: The area that the Mantis Lords are located in can be accessed after obtaining the Mantis Claw and activating a lever in the northeast part of the Mantis Village.

items.name: Nosk
items.how-to-find: A breakable wall in the room directly west of the Deepnest Hot Spring reveals a secret section containing a Grub. Breaking another wall behind the Grub leads to the tunnels and into Nosk's lair.

items.name: Soul Master
items.how-to-find: Soul Master is located in the upper part of Soul Sanctum.

items.name: Traitor Lord
items.how-to-find: The Traitor Lord is located in the upper section of the Queen's Gardens, beyond a Shade Gate.

items.name: Uumuu
items.how-to-find: Uumuu is located in the centre of the Teacher's Archives.

items.name: Watcher Knight
items.how-to-find: The Watcher Knights are located near the top of Watcher's Spire.
